MK_Info_Approve.sql: SELECT g.ID,g.ApprovedGroupName, ( SELECT ty.ID+','+ty.ApprovedTypeName+','+ty.ClassIconfont+','+ ty.BackgroundColor+','+(ISNULL(tmp.ID,'#N#')) +';' FROM MK_Type_ApprovedType ty LEFT JOIN MK_Type_ApprovedTemplate tmp ON tmp.ApprovedTypeID = ty.ID WHERE ty.ApprovedGroupID = g.ID AND ty.ShowMark = 'Y' ORDER BY ty.Sort FOR XML PATH('') ) AS ApprovedTypes FROM dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedGroup g WHERE g.ShowMark = 'Y' ORDER BY g.Sort

SELECT Approve_ChangeMark,CC_ChangeMark, (SELECT ApproveID+','+ApproveName+';' FROM MK_Info_Approve WHERE UserID = a.ID FOR XML PATH('')) ApproveInfo, (SELECT CCID+','+CCName+';' FROM MK_Info_CC WHERE UserID = a.ID FOR XML PATH('')) CCInfo FROM MK_Info_User a WHERE a.UserName = @UserName

SELECT * INTO #TableResult FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY task.CreateDate DESC ) AS RowID, task.ID , apdg.ApprovedGroupName, apdty.ApprovedTypeName, task.TitleValue ,task.DescValue ,task.ApproveorName ,task.ApprovedResultDesc, task.CreateDate ,task.ApproveStatus ,task.CreateUser , (SELECT '[ '+CCName+' ] ' FROM dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTaskCC WHERE ApprovedTaskID = task.ID FOR XML PATH('')) AS CCName FROM dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTask task JOIN dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedType apdty ON apdty.ID = task.ApprovedTypeID JOIN dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedGroup apdg ON apdg.ID = apdty.ApprovedGroupID WHERE task.ShowMark = 'Y' AND task.CreateUser = @CreateUser AND apdg.ID = ISNULL(@ApprovedGroupID,apdg.ID) AND apdty.ID = ISNULL(@ApprovedTypeID,apdty.ID) AND task.ApproveStatus = ISNULL(@ApproveStatus,task.ApproveStatus) AND task.CreateDate BETWEEN ISNULL(@StartDate,'2018-5-20') AND ISNULL(CAST(CAST(@EndDate AS DATE) AS VARCHAR(20)) + ' 23:59:57',DATEADD(HH,1,GETDATE())) ) as t order by t.RowID
SELECT TOP (@limit) * FROM #TableResult WHERE RowID > (@limit*(@page-1)) SELECT COUNT(ID) AS rows FROM #TableResult DROP TABLE #TableResult

SELECT a.ID ,(d.DataLabeName+ ': ' +c.DataTypeName) AS DataTypeName ,(d.DataParameter + ': ' +a.DataParameter) AS DataParameter FROM dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTaskDetail a JOIN dbo.MK_Type_DictionaryLabel b ON b.ID = a.DictionaryLabelID JOIN dbo.MK_Type_DataDictionary c ON c.ID = a.DataDictionaryID JOIN dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTask t ON t.ID = a.ApprovedTaskID JOIN dbo.MK_Type_ApprovedTemplate d ON d.ApprovedTypeID = t.ApprovedTypeID WHERE ApprovedTaskID = @ApprovedTaskID
SELECT ID,ImagesPath FROM dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTaskImages WHERE ApprovedTaskID = @ApprovedTaskID
UPDATE dbo.MK_Info_ApprovedTask SET ShowMark = 'N' WHERE ID = @ID
